paper_abstract: In this paper. we analyze the robustness for low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes over the Gilbert-Elliott (GE) channel. For this purpose we propose a density evolution method for the case where LDPC decoder uses the mismatched parameters for the GE channel. Using this method, we derive the region of tuples of true parameters and mismatched decoding parameters for the GE channel. where the decoding error probability approaches asymptotically to zero.
paper_title: Density Evolution Analysis of Robustness for LDPC Codes over the Gilbert-Elliott Channel
